title: Locating $$e^x$$
text: Press the button labeled $$e^x$$ on the calculator.
speech: Press the button labeled  e to the x-th  on the calculator.
pacedSpeech: Press the button labeled   e to the x-th

title: Subsituting Values
text: Input the value $$3.14$$ as the exponent and press enter.
speech: Input the value  3.14  as the exponent and press enter.
pacedSpeech: as the exponent and press enter.
